Instructions

- Select a background color using the color picker

- Click on the tiles on top and use the color picker to assign them a color

- Click the spotify playlist and paste a url of a playlist in the alert

- Click a singular tile, or multiply tiles that form a quadrilateral to select them. Click off the tiles to deselect.

- Click on the upload popup, then upload an image

Improvement/fixes needed

- Improve color picker UI quality

- Better dynamic positioning of the popup div depending on which tiles are selected

- A few bugs caused when multiple tiles are selected and an image is uploaded. The image is usually positioned incorrectly. Sometimes too many tiles are removed or added.

- Functionality to revert multiple joined tiles back into their individualized state

- Smoother UX in selecting tiles. A dragging functionality to extend tiles would be a lot more intuitive than clicking individual tiles
